div.p: ANTONIO: Wow, that information is really interesting, and it might be surprising to a lot of people.
MICHELLE: Yeah, the research lets us know we don't need to have emotional problems in order to develop alcoholism or drug addiction.
ANTONIO: So, earlier, we made a list of the types of person most people would say would develop alcoholism. Are any of them accurate?
MICHELLE: Well, while there's no addictive personality type that causes alcoholism, research identified several personality traits that are more common among people who do.
ANTONIO: Okay. I'm really curious to see what they are.
